name: Lottie Preston
review: Nice laptop for school! Small and powerful.

name: Terra Mccullough
review: Small size and powerfull. Resolution is a bit of a down. Odd touchpad. Sound could be better

name: Cervantes Baldwin
review: This Dell XPS 13 9310 is a nice little laptop. Perfect size. Nice touch screen. Beautiful colors.

name: Wise Reed
review: Touch is great, screen colors and image quality is great, reflections are not very noticable, keyboard is great, performance seems ok but that could just be Windows acting up.

name: Owens Pennington
review: This laptop is not up to snuff. The microphone is located in an awful place. I have never been able to be heard on this laptop with a headset.

name: Jody York
review: I have the 13inch laptop, and I'm loving it. Quick startup and processing. My only gripe is the touchscreen when typing on the numbers at the top of the keyboard.

name: Reed Herrera
review: Well, laptop is amazing I like it, and Amazon Customer Service was also concerned.

name: Rosemarie Raymond
review: It definitely feels like a premium device. Very happy with my purchase, hopefully, it lasts because it was not cheap.
